sentences: Ma kujutan ette, et see on hea mõte.
Ta kujutas endale, millisest sai võtta osa.
Kujutage ette, kui tore see oleks.
context: The word 'kujutad' is the second person singular form of the verb 'kujutama', which means to imagine or picture something in your mind. It is commonly used in Estonian language to describe the act of creating a mental image of something.
